trans-unit.source:
\n

Contains methods to create types of objects locally or remotely, or obtain references to existing remote objects.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an instance of the specified type using that type's default constructor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx$x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A reference to the newly created object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The constructor being called throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Cannot create an instance of an abstract class, or this member was invoked with a late-binding mechanism.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntype is a COM object but the class identifier used to obtain the type is invalid, or the identified class is not registered.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx x XXX xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an instance of the specified type using that type's default constructor.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx$x xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if a public or nonpublic default constructor can match; false if only a public default constructor can match.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx x xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A reference to the newly created object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The constructor being called throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Cannot create an instance of an abstract class, or this member was invoked with a late-binding mechanism.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx x xxxx$xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntype is a COM object but the class identifier used to obtain the type is invalid, or the identified class is not registered.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx x XXX xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates an instance of the specified type using the constructor that best matches the specified parameters.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx$ xxxxx$ xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If args is an empty array or null, the constructor that takes no parameters (the default constructor) is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Xx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntype is a COM object but the class identifier used to obtain the type is invalid, or the identified class is not registered.

\n

\n
